title: Remove the remake feature in "normal" games
body:
Seriously, unlike games in ranked. There's absolutely nothing at stake in normals. It's where people can play the champs they want how they want. I've seen ashe mid, blitzcrank top, and teemo go support.

More importantly, one missing player that not guarantee a loss. There's now more cs to go around making 4 players just as strong as 5.

https://media.tenor.co/images/b0f21fc003ae8752a6529e5fbe2da199/tenor.gif

No. 

I will assume you ragequit or afked and ate a remake, and are now salty about it... No. It was added to prevent people wasting half an hour of their life because some brat is "punishing" them for a pick they dont like.

I'm just curious if you aim to get as many dislikes as possible?  What's really sad is you're a tryhard troll. Like, slow it down with all the posts bro. 

A good troll picks and chooses the best topics and times. You don't shotgun blast the forums with 10 posts a day hoping to get a decent troll in.

No jungler?
Okay, we didn't need dragons or baron anyhow.
Lost one of your 2 carries? Nah, it's fine, we don't need to win teamfights.
We can just sit and dance at the fountain untill the 20 minute mark.


Bad idea is bad.
So what makes a 4v5 in ranked different from a 4v5 in normal? Like are the champions weaker in ranked if you are on a team of 4?
Your MMR in normals actually determines where you stand when you start a fresh account for ranked, sooooooooooooooo, how about no.
Teemo can totally support you just blind the adc constantly it's pretty funny if you haven't tried it plus shrooms are like wards but explode for decent damage.
You could be so much better at the game if you spent your time practicing instead of fishing for downvotes on here.
